item.title: Discover Huntsville - AR App developed at Trideum
item.description: Discover Huntsville is an AR app I helped create as a tech artist and programmer. I created procedural assets in houdini for the AR experience, designed NPR shaders, and coded in C# using Unity. Additionally I participated in planning and communication between teams and gave presentations and updates during meetings.
